value.message: Resource interfaces use predictable sequential string IDs without backend ownership verification logic, which may lead to IDOR vulnerabilities.
value.suggestion: Use UUIDs for resource IDs and ensure backend authorization logic verifies resource ownership for all CRUD operations.
